mapper.select:
SELECT HOUR(cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME) AS HOUR_ORDER, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.NUM_OF_FOOD),0) AS NUM_OF_FOOD, SUM(cafeOrder.TOTAL_MONEY) AS TOTAL_MONEY FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder WHERE cafeOrder.STATUS=2 AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME >=#{startTime} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME <=#{endTime} GROUP BY HOUR_ORDER
ORDER BY HOUR_ORDER
ORDER BY NUM_OF_FOOD
ORDER BY TOTAL_MONEY
ASC
DESC

SELECT DAYNAME(cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME) AS DAY_ORDER_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.NUM_OF_FOOD),0) AS NUM_OF_FOOD, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.TOTAL_MONEY),0) AS TOTAL_MONEY FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder WHERE cafeOrder.STATUS=2 AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME >=#{startTime} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME <=#{endTime} GROUP BY DAY_ORDER_NAME
ORDER BY NUM_OF_FOOD
ORDER BY TOTAL_MONEY
ASC
DESC

SELECT cafeOrder.CAFE_TABLE_SN, cafeTable.NAME, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.NUM_OF_FOOD),0) AS NUM_OF_FOOD, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.TOTAL_MONEY),0) AS TOTAL_MONEY FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder, CAFE_TABLE cafeTable WHERE cafeOrder.CAFE_TABLE_SN=cafeTable.SN AND cafeOrder.STATUS=2 AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME >=#{startTime} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME <=#{endTime} GROUP BY cafeOrder.CAFE_TABLE_SN,cafeTable.NAME
ORDER BY NUM_OF_FOOD
ORDER BY TOTAL_MONEY
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY NUM_OF_FOOD DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT cafeOrder.*, food.NAME AS FOOD_NAME,cafeTable.NAME AS CAFE_TABLE_NAME ,foodUnit.NAME AS FOOD_UNIT_NAME FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder, FOOD food, FOOD_UNIT foodUnit,CAFE_TABLE cafeTable WHERE cafeOrder.CAFE_TABLE_SN=cafeTable.SN AND cafeOrder.FOOD_SN=food.SN AND food.FOOD_UNIT_SN = foodUnit.SN AND cafeOrder.SN=#{sn} AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn}

SELECT DAYNAME(cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME) AS DAY_ORDER_NAME,DATE(cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME) AS ORDER_DATE, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.NUM_OF_FOOD),0) AS NUM_OF_FOOD, IFNULL(SUM(cafeOrder.TOTAL_MONEY),0) AS TOTAL_MONEY, MIN(cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME) AS FIRST_ORDER, MAX(cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME) AS LAST_ORDER FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder WHERE cafeOrder.STATUS=2 AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME >=#{startTime} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME <=#{endTime} GROUP BY ORDER_DATE
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE
ORDER BY NUM_OF_FOOD
ORDER BY TOTAL_MONEY
DESC
ASC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

(SELECT food.SN,food.NAME AS FOOD_NAME,food.PRICE,foodUnit.NAME AS FOOD_UNIT_NAME, foodUnit.SN AS FOOD_UNIT_SN, SUM(cafeOrder.NUM_OF_FOOD) AS NUM_OF_FOOD, SUM(cafeOrder.TOTAL_MONEY) AS TOTAL_MONEY FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder, FOOD food, FOOD_UNIT foodUnit WHERE cafeOrder.FOOD_SN=food.SN AND food.FOOD_UNIT_SN = foodUnit.SN AND cafeOrder.STATUS=2 AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME >=#{startTime} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME <=#{endTime} GROUP BY food.SN,FOOD_NAME,FOOD_UNIT_NAME,FOOD_UNIT_SN) UNION ALL (SELECT food.SN,food.NAME AS FOOD_NAME,food.PRICE,foodUnit.NAME AS FOOD_UNIT_NAME, foodUnit.SN AS FOOD_UNIT_SN, 0 AS NUM_OF_FOOD, 0 AS TOTAL_MONEY FROM FOOD food, FOOD_UNIT foodUnit WHERE food.FOOD_UNIT_SN = foodUnit.SN AND food.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT cafeOrder.SN FROM CAFE_ORDER cafeOrder WHERE cafeOrder.FOOD_SN=food.SN AND cafeOrder.STATUS=2 AND cafeOrder.CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME >=#{startTime} AND cafeOrder.ORDER_TIME <=#{endTime}))
ORDER BY NUM_OF_FOOD
ORDER BY TOTAL_MONEY
DESC
ASC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAFE_ORDER SET FOOD_SN=#{foodSn}, CAFE_TABLE_SN=#{cafeTableSn}, PRICE=#{price}, NUM_OF_FOOD=#{numOfFood}, MEMO=#{memo}, TOTAL_MONEY=#{totalMoney}, DISCOUNT=#{discount}, LAST_UPDATE_STAFF_SN=#{lastUpdateStaffSn} WHERE SN=#{sn} AND CAFE_SHOP_SN=#{cafeShopSn}
